title: Bitget Will List YZY MONEY (YZY) in the Innovation and Meme Zone
content:
Bitget Will List YZY MONEY (YZY) in the Innovation and Meme Zone
We are thrilled to announce that YZY MONEY (YZY) will be listed in the Innovation and Meme Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 21 Aug 2025, 03:12 AM (UTC)
Withdrawal Available: 22 Aug 2025, 04:00 AM (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: YZY/USDT
Introduction
The YZY token is a cryptocurrency launched by American rapper Kanye West, intended as the official payment currency for the Yeezy brand. YZY tokenomics: 20% for public sale, 10% for liquidity pool, 30% allocated to Yeezy Investments LLC (3-month lockup, 24-month linear release), 20% allocated to the team (6-month lockup, 24-month linear release), and 20% for the ecosystem development fund (12-month lockup, 24-month linear release).
Contract Address (SOL) :
DrZ26cKJDksVRWib3DVVsjo9eeXccc7hKhDJviiYEEZY
